title: Scene 1 - fleeing the crossroads towards the Docks
where_when:
as the crossroads fade into memory you arrive at the North part of Island. 

its mid morning, Grey, windy and cold  and you have arrived at the marina
text:
You emerge from the path into the north end of town. The marina is nearly empty. Only one ship remains, a ragged crew scrambling across its deck while a large man bellows orders.

Shops along the waterfront are hastily boarded, doors braced with mismatched scraps — splintered fence posts, broken crates, even pieces of furniture torn apart in a rush. The air feels tight with panic.

People hurry through the streets with carts, baskets, and bags heaped with food and valuables. Some push wheelbarrows piled high; others clutch bundles over their shoulders.They all seem to be heading in the same direction as they head for the small foothills in the distance, cautious eyes dart constantly toward the sea.

You stop and mutter, “What the hell is going on?”
exit_line: How come I never come around the corner to eggs and bacon? I like eggs and bacon

title: You're skeptical, but a lack of information make you hope like the best  option.
text: What happens if the player picked A from the parent scene.
exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: Scene 1B - outcome of B
text: Run for the hills!!
exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: Too Late
text:
Your determined to discover the Malady that could be the cause of this Panic, in the distance  The crowd runs inland. The sea goes quiet, then slowly drains, your limbs frozen at the site of it. the ocean revealing it scars and debris on its sandy underbelly 

suddenly you see it. the wall of water coming straight at you, what must have been moments feels like seconds, theres no where to go and nothing to do about it, the sky is blanketed over in salty darkness as the wave starts to crest 
.suddenly you feel your chest cave, as your lungs explode, instantly your crushed by a wall of cold wet Darkness.
exit_line: Congratz!! Your story ends in Tragic fashion.
